byline.original: By SCOTT REYBURN and ROBIN POGREBIN

abstract: Christie's auction of Impressionist and Modern works of art garners total of $145.5 million, with 83 percent of 59 lots sold; auction reflects preference in art market for contemporary art.
lead_paragraph: Impressionist and Modern works have dimmed in the eyes of many major collectors, but despite a lack of fireworks, bidding was solid at the middle range of $3 million to $5 million.

headline.main: Impressionist and Modern Works Bring Solid Bids at Christie’s Auction
headline.print_headline: Christie’s Ends Run of Auctions With Solid Bids

snippet: Impressionist and Modern works have dimmed in the eyes of many major collectors, but despite a lack of fireworks, bidding was solid at the middle range of $3 million to $5 million.
